title: Confused Biden with Obama
description:
# Confused Biden with Obama (Multiple Times)

- Repeatedly mixed up Barack Obama and Joe Biden during 2023-2024 campaign
- **"We're beating Obama"** in the polls [Source: Rally speeches, 2023; CNN]
- Claimed he was running against Obama in 2024 [Source: Multiple rally statements, The Mirror, CNN]
- Also confused Nikki Haley with Nancy Pelosi when discussing January 6 [Source: Rally speech, January 2024]
summary:
- Repeatedly mixed up Barack Obama and Joe Biden during 2023-2024 campaign
- "We're beating Obama" in the polls 
- Claimed he was running against Obama in 2024 
- Also confused Nikki Haley with Nancy Pelosi when discussing January 6
